Text.Page:
Do you want to lord over it all in jade?

Exchange Jade Crystals with me between 17th and 22nd September and I’ll capture Jadewings of your choice. Don’t worry, my traps don’t do the dragons any harm. Learn and use all 5 riding skills to receive the Jade Emperor title.

Jadewings are proud beasts, often underestimated. They’re an easy catch for experienced dragon hunters, so I’m only too happy to place some in your good hands.
